thread.title: Homes that give you a lift – in pictures
thread.title_full: Homes that give you a lift – in pictures | Money | The Guardian

author: Anna Tims
title: Homes that give you a lift – in pictures
text:
Homes that give you a lift – in pictures If you like the luxury of private transport to the higher reaches of your home, here are some properties to consider
Anna Tims
Monday 27 July 2015 07.00 BST
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email Share on Pinterest Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Eastbourne, East Sussex
A lift delivers you to the sixth floor where this four-bedroom duplex and its enormous roof terraces overlook the harbour. However the lift only gets you as far as the lower floor. You have to hike upstairs to bed. Asking price: £650,000.
King & Chasemore , 01323 453 227
Facebook Twitter Pinterest Share Share this post Facebook Twitter Pinterest close Taunton, Somerset
You can ride from the entrance hall up to the first floor living areas and the three bedrooms on the top floor. The garden opens on to a public park. The fourth bedroom is alone on the ground floor and could form part of a self-contained flat. Guide price: £575,000.
Humberts , 01823 288 484
Facebook Twitter Pinterest Share Share this post Facebook Twitter Pinterest close Church Hill, Milford on Sea, Hampshire
This stately wing of a mansion has a lift from the drawing room to the four bedrooms. It looks out across the Solent to the Isle of Wight. It’s a shame that there’s only a courtyard for its private garden. Leasehold: £950,000.
John D Wood , 01590 540 067
Facebook Twitter Pinterest Share Share this post Facebook Twitter Pinterest close
